r:
"Y'know... You could lie to yourself, say you imagined this day going differently. You could have imagined today being boring, the game being a rip off and just being content to screw around in Minecraft for the day. But no. You knew all too well how today was going to go. It couldn't have gone any other way. You accept the inevitability of the universe with begrudging compliance. But still, sometimes you feel like whatever higher power is out there is just telling you to go stuck yourself..."

Go Stuck Yourself is an epic Fan Adventure, designed with the classic homestuck feel but with a real twist! This is a collab Fan Adventure so there will be many styles of artwork!

Also on MSPA Forums! http://mspaforums.com/showthread.php?57497-Go-Stuck-yourself-The-beginning-of-a-brand-new-stucky-world

p.c: Go Stuck Yourself!
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0001.gif[/img]

Y'know... You could lie to yourself, say you imagined this day going differently. You could have imagined today being boring, the game being a rip off and just being content to screw around in Minecraft for the day. But no. You knew all too well how today was going to go. It couldn't have gone any other way. You accept the inevitability of the universe with begrudging compliance. But still, sometimes you feel like whatever higher power is out there is just telling you to go stuck yourself...

Let's rewind a few hours and see how we got into this mess shall we?
Who will you be?



====================================
Welcome to Go Stuck Yourself!

This was my first ever fanventure on MSPFA and it was featured on the long dead MSPA forums where I would update it back in 2014 under the name FubbalyWubbaly. Unfortunately, most of the team lost interest and this fanventure eventually died. It's suffered from digital rot and to this day I have not been able to recover the final images.

~ CeruleanSnake
====================================

p.c: Be the cool kid.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0002.gif[/img]

You rewind a few hours to see how it all went down-oh suddenly theres a cool kid on the screen. You wonder what this sweet dude's deal is, or who they even are. You could ask, but this kid is just too damn cool. You could just feel the chill oozing right out of every pore... ok that sound mighty gross... Maybe we can try guessing his name?

Lets try that

p.c: Enter name.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0003.gif[/img]

I don't think Bronson appreciates that...

p.c: Try again.
p.b: [img]./assets/img/story/0004.gif[/img]

p.c: Examine room.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0005.gif[/img]

Your name is CHAZ SERLING.

You are a street tough kid.
Mostly you are a bit of a trouble maker and a bit of a thief and sometimes just a down right PUBLIC NUICANCE.

You are almost incomplete without your SWEET SKATEBOARD which you use as transport everywhere. you also love taking it to the local park and perform some SICK STUNTS, most which you fail at.
You are also a fan of gore movies and anime, loving a good horror and thriller. a good favourite is the SAW series. they got some sweet traps and gory scenes there. You are also a bit of a fanatic about BLADES AND KNVES. You love a good strong quality knife and carry your trusty SWITCH BLADE with you always. and your knife has gotten you out of quite a few jams, and in to quite a few too. 
When not watching movies, you tend to enjoy a bit of gaming. Thats right you are a BIG NERD at heart as you are often secretly found playing pokemon and a few other childish games. You are particually fond of BUG POKEMON mostly as you own a neat collection of dead bugs, and you have a killer PET SPIDER named charorlette. You also love jamming on your ELECTRIC BASS, you pour your passion and soul into your music, but its probably best you don't play publicly, you material would need heavy censoring. 
Sometimes you also like to get a bit drunk.

Its quite a hot, summer morning, pretty normal for the month of FEBRUARY in the land down under, you have your fan set to ludicrous speed.

What will you do?

p.c: Chaz: Inspect Pikachu plush on bed.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0006.png[/img]

Ahhh, that plush. Your best friend VZ gave you that for your 16th birthday, which wasn't very long ago. Only VZ knows your secret love for pokemon.

p.c: Chaz: Fondly fondle the Pikachu plushie on your bed.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0007a.gif[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/0007b.gif[/img]

[i]My Preciousssssss~[/i]


No one must ever know

p.c: Chaz: Bite off more than you can chew.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0008.gif[/img]

Ok, this is getting out of hand. This is your best friend's gift to you and it tastes like polyester and bed bugs

p.c: Chaz: Step away from the Pikachu.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0009.gif[/img]

You put the Pikachu down and step away. Man that was sure getting weird. You still can't get the taste of polyester out of your mouth. 
Huh? 
Looks like one of your buddies is pestering you, better see what they want.

p.c: Chaz: Ponder about what your friends said.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0012.png[/img]

You think about what your friends both said. You really ought to lay off the sauce. 
Last time you could swear that goat wasn't yours.

But... its so tempting, the bitter, yet heavenly taste of a good brewed Vodka, and theres a few bottles unopened around your room, you would sure hate to let them go to waste. 

What should you do?

p.c: Chaz: Pour it onto the floor. You don't need that shit.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0013.png[/img]

Yes, this is the most fucking brilliant plan you have ever thought of, lets do that! 

Shit, you got some on your shoe.

p.c: Chaz: Suck it from the carpet. You need that shit.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0014.gif[/img]

Bronson, what do you think you are? A dog?
Come now, you aren't that desperate. There's plenty of bottles around and still some left in that other one. 

Besides, your carpet is filled with all sorts of gross shit.

p.c: Chaz: Go and drink, but only a little bit.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0015.png[/img]

Well... Suppose finishing off the bottle can't hurt.
After all, its only one small drink... right?

[i]Right??[/i]

[img]./assets/img/story/0016.gif[/img]

Fuck that!

It's a one man party and you're hot on the dance floor. 
Bottle in your hand and mouth full of happy drink its a...

[SIZE=44][FONT=Comic Sans MS][B]VODKA PAAAARRRRRTYYYYYY![/B][/FONT][/SIZE]

[img]./assets/img/story/0017.gif[/img]

Hoo boy that was one drinking session. But it was just a little drink.... right!?

You stand there, enjoying your drink an- Her again? Thought she went to bed...

How [b]LONG[/b] was that vodka party?

Better hop on the computer, typing on your phone when drunk is disastrous.

p.c: Chaz: Answer Chum.
p.b:

Better do as she says and go get some water, but this stuff makes you want to piss more than heavy rain.

To get water, or to not get water.
That is the question.

p.c: Chaz: Better drink your own piss, Bear Grylls.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0020.png[/img]

[i]The world can be a harsh place when you're drunk. 
And its easy to get lost on your way to the toilet. 
Shit.[/i]

Better drink your own piss.

[img]./assets/img/story/0021.gif[/img]

Ok, thats the most stupidest thing you could think of. 
You can tolerate dry beer, but you draw the line at piss. Besides, it's just got alcohol in it, no way on sobering up from that! 

You gotta think of something better!

p.c: Chaz: Go find water you douche.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0022a.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/0022b.png[/img]

You decide to use the bathroom later and head into the main room. Thank god your auntie just left to go buy more liquor.
Strifes with her can be rather... tense.

You take a look around before deciding what to do next.

p.c: Chaz: Inspect adorable ladybug clock.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0023.png[/img]

Oh god... that should have been thrown in the trash! 

Its the ugliest piece of junk ever to exist. It's obvious auntie knows you love insects and really bugs you about it. 
She is either trying to appeal to your feminine side or is just giving you passive aggressive gestures.

Either way its an ugly piece of shit... 
And they're all over the damn apartment.

[img]./assets/img/story/0024.png[/img]

You step away from that ugly crap an decide to take a look in the kitchen for anything decent.

That should be the best place to acquire water!
if you could see it well... man being drunk has its downsides.

p.c: Chaz: Inspect fridge.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0025a.gif[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/0025b.png[/img]

You decide to check out the fridge to see what sweet cool beverages there are-

Wait...

Whats that...?

[img]./assets/img/story/0026.gif[/img]

I-Is that...!?

Please let it be...

[img]./assets/img/story/0027.gif[/img]

[size=17][b][i]OH SWEET BABY JESUS THE HEAVENS HAVE BLESSED![/i][/b][/size]

You just gotta tell RB, she is going to be so exited!

p.c: Chaz: Pretend it's piss. And drink it.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0030.gif[/img]

Honestly, what is with your obsession with piss today? thats just the most stupid idea you ever had!
Who do you think you are, Chaz Grylls??

p.c: Chaz: Are you sure that's lemonade? Why is it clear?
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0031.png[/img]

Well, you've seen a lot of commercial lemonade clear coloured. Suppose piss can be clear too.
What about that creaming soda thats piss coloured? 

Wait, didn't we just get off the topic of fucking piss?

[img]./assets/img/story/0032.gif[/img]

Though, you've heard stories before of people pulling some sick pranks in the drinks... spitting in them or something?
Imagine if someone actually pissed in a bottle and you never know?

[img]./assets/img/story/0033.gif[/img]

And instead of a refreshing cool lemonade, you would end up with a bottle of gross piss!
You'd be definitely pissed...

Bad pun, you know.

[img]./assets/img/story/0034.gif[/img]

Ok seriously, enough of piss! 
You just want to enjoy a nice cold, slightly flat and crappy tasting lemonade without having to think that some random dude pissed in it! 
Maybe if you're Bear Grylls then that would be ok, but you're not! 

Oh shit, did you remember to put the lid on that bottle!?

[img]./assets/img/story/0035.png[/img]

Now you're covered in sticky, cold, slightly flat and sorta crappy tasting lemonade... 
Fucking great.

p.c: Chaz: Get yourself cleaned up, and don a few hats. Y'know, just to disguise yourself in case your aunt comes back.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0036a.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/0036b.png[/img]

You get all cleaned up and head over to the lounge part where your aunt usually resides. 
Ahhhhh, there's your dapper hat collection! It feels insulted sitting amongst your aunts ungodly flower crap. Good thing she still kept your collection! You really had an eye for rather gentlemanly hats when you were younger, they have such style and upper class feel. 
Man wouldn't life be great when rich?

You don your favourite gentleman's hat, which looks rather odd with your outfit and hair right now. Bet your aunt will never find out haha!

[i]What it needs is a smashing good cane! Then it will be the perfect disguise![/i]

p.c: Chaz: Wear all the hats! Become the ultimate hat master wearer in all the world.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0037a.gif[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/0037b.gif[/img]

You don all you really dapper hats, managing to balance them in your drunk state.
Now you are 300% more classy, and even more disguised! You are truly... 

[i]The ultimate hat master wearer in all the world![/i]

Wait, doesn't this remind you of a certain Shooter Multiplayer game commonly found on Steam?

p.c: Chaz: Yeah, you're thinking of "Team Fortress 2!" Now go play some TF2 for eight hours.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0038.gif[/img]

[i]Hell fucking yes![/i]

Thats the best idea you had! nothing like random guys pissing in lemon and Bear Grylls.
You race off to head to your computer as fast as you can and-

Oh shit you forgot about the hats!

p.c: Chaz: Pick up those hats.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0039.gif[/img]

Damn doorway being too low for your totally sick hat tower.

You captchalouge the hat collection in your Lock modus. 
You'll need to find the key to unlock it again...

Or just jimmy it open with your switch blade, you always do that.

p.c: Chaz: Quick, to your room!
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0040.gif[/img]

You finally reach your room to only realise just now you're getting more messages from your pal. 
You had almost forgotten the phone was still in your pocket.

Your Fetch modus is so annoying that sometimes you just simply use your pocket. Strange! You know!

[img]./assets/img/story/0044.gif[/img]

What’s this? You are suddenly in a room with a goth kid. Skulls and black lipstick seem to be the flag under which all goth kids march these days. What’s up with her and her revolting and borderline neon carpet? You wonder how she even manage to find that horrifying colour in real life. With her pre-established goth status, this kid would probably tell you a story about how she sold her pet frog to a witch and had it blended in exchange for neon-purple dyes holy shit.

Non-existent interior decor skills aside, what’s her name?

p.c: Enter Name.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0045.gif[/img]

It seems Cthulhu didn't appreciate that.

p.c: Mysterious girl: Let the divine horrorterrors of the deep, or Innsmouth, or whatever the fuck insert your name for you.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0046.gif[/img]

There we go. Was it so hard?

p.c: Examine Room.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0047.png[/img]

Your name is LINA MILAEN and you are not a goth kid.

Surprisingly.

You live in a SUBURBAN HOUSE near the edge of the neighbourhood. You love COOKING with the PUMPKINS you are rather good at GROWING in the BACKYARD even though you have little friends to share it with in person. You can't wait to start THE GAME everyone was talking about to finally meet your ONLINE FRIENDS from Pesterchum. You have a PET CAT that snuck into your house one stormy night and refused to leave. You have affectionately named the feline LITTLE MONSTER for an accident when he scratched you across your arms. You like DRAWING but SUCK AT IT but you keep doing it anyway to paste the SHITTY THINGS all around your guardian's room.

You often find yourself UNABLE TO SLEEP in the empty house ever since your guardian DISAPPEARED a year ago. Sleep would come easily if MOM had not left all her FAKE SKULLS around the house. At least, you hope they are fake. You absolutely hate DEAD THINGS and your guardian used to get a kick out of freaking you out with HANGING SKELETONS hidden in places you never knew had space to stuff them in. She was also the one responsible for only ever buying you SKULL THEMED SHIRTS, most likely for her previously mentioned tendency to make you extremely uncomfortable.

Due to exposure to constant frights of unknown dead things falling on you, you almost always equipped with your SCYTHE to slash at falling objects with unfortunately HONED REFLEXES. Your mom always told you how a young lady should know how to defend yourself. You hope booby trapping the house wasn't her way to TRAIN YOU. 

Mom sends monthly allowances along with postcards of places she had spent the last year. You think she is a SHITTY GUARDIAN for leaving a minor at home alone.

You are aware you have a BAD CASE of MOMMY ISSUES.

What will you do?

p.c: Lina: Examine sleeping Little Monster.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0048.png[/img]

Aww look at the little thing, all tuckered out after a day of doing nothing. You wonder if it was possible to turn into a cat for a day to sleep off all your troubles.

She is sleeping on your game guide, but you would not want a repeat of that incident that happened some time back, now do you?

p.c: Lina: Carefully nudge Little Monster with scythe handle.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0049.gif[/img]

NO!!

Do. Not. Want. Repeat. Of. Scratching incident!

p.c: Pile of things on the floor. What they be?
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0050.jpg[/img]

Oh that. It's one of mom's monthly post of generic postcards from all around the world.

You regard the stack of postcards with distaste.

p.c: Lina: Stomp.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0051.gif[/img]

Gladly.

What kind of parent up leaves their sixteen-year old kid alone in the house with no warning and absolutely no supervision afterwards??

Hell, you are sure you could take care of yourself without your guardian around, but what you wouldn't give to smack the stacks upon stacks of postcards from her presumably joyous travels around the world on the side of her face and burn the whole load out in the front yard.

p.c: Lina: Pester the Australian coolkid.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0052.gif[/img]

Not the coolkid, but another Australian!

[img]./assets/img/story/0055.png[/img]

Just like you thought, the cool kid could not resist the draw of his aunt's unguarded vodka stash. You really hope to meet him before he ends up drinking himself under the table again. Given the chance, you'll hide all those bottles of liver-destroying poison away.

You worry for the doofus.

p.c: Lina: What's in that cup next to your computer?
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0056.jpg[/img]

Why the sudden interest in a mug? There's nothing but water in there...
Oh could you be lying?

p.c: Lina: Examine Inside the mug
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0057.gif[/img]

Oh alright! So it's not a normal mug after all... It's your favourite lava mug! Where water touches it, the unnamed substance the mug is made of darkens and glows like lava! SS once told you it was the most metal mug. Neat!

You ordered it off of one of Google's hundreds of merchandise pages some time ago when you found your mom's old credit card stuck under her bed. You are aware that there were possible legal consequences to such an action, but you were angry and in a middle of an audience-less tantrum, and who the heck cares!

p.c: Lina: Absent-mindedly browse bookshelves while worrying about the doofus.
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0058a.png[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/0058b.jpg[/img]

You haven't had the chance to update your less than conventional collection of novels in a while. You have had these for as long as you can remember. "There were secrets in these books," your mom had impressed upon you in your childhood. 

You think it's a bunch of bull. 

The novels themselves have no secrets. They were just books with all sorts of stories in them. What you hide in them though...

[img]./assets/img/story/0059a.gif[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/0059b.jpg[/img]

"What's Out There", a book with an extremely misleading cover. One would expect this to be filled with beautiful photographs and diagrams of different galaxies and nebulons in the infinite depths of the universe.

[img]./assets/img/story/0060.gif[/img]

Except, well, it's filled with lines and lines of text- OOPS!

p.c: What was that?
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0061.jpg[/img]

You have completely forgotten you had one of your notebooks in there. 

Now that's top secret.

Pretend it never exist.

p.c: Shhhh...
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0062.gif[/img]

There you go. See, nothing suspicious there. 

Just boring old text that is somehow supposed to show you "what's out there". Needless to say, you are not seeing it. You think you might end up burning this utterly useless book one day at a campfire. You'll bring all your books there. Well, the useless ones, at least.

p.c: Lina: Flap like a pigeon and do flips on your bed
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0063.jpg[/img]

Wait.

p.c: Lina: Coo coo
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0064.gif[/img]

Coo coo!

Coo coo. Cooo, coo cooo coo coooo coooo- WAIT

p.c: What!
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0065.gif[/img]

Co- Snap out of it! What's up with these picoogeon shtick!?

Cooo- STOP

p.c: Lina: Get on with non-avian business!
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0066.gif[/img]

Oh look, the Little Monster is awake. And she's gone already. 

You wonder if mom taught it to flashstep. You don't think it was fair your guardian neglect to teach you the skill that somehow your cat knew.

p.c: Lina: You're reading your book backwards, it's a whole other book when you read it forward!
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0067.gif[/img]

[img]./assets/img/story/0068.gif[/img]

Oh, that makes lesser sense than when you read it forward. 

The book was meant to tell a story of some protagonists travelling from their humble place on their home planet to the outer galaxies. Reading it backwards is like reading the unwinding of the universe where the poor fellows were being dragged back to the muddy rock they came from that ends with the snap and crackle of the explosive opening scene! Figuratively speaking.

As fascinating as that sounds, it looks ridiculous on paper.

p.c: Lina: Leave the book alone
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0068.png[/img]

That was a waste of time.

p.c: Lina: The game is unguarded. Grab it before Little Monster does!
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0069.gif[/img]

In it goes into your sylladex. Your TOWER fetch modus tends to lean and fall over onto itself if you stack too many objects into it. Swiping cards from the deck is particularly hard when the whole stack sways every time you so much as touch it. You have to constantly clear your sylladex of useless things occupying much needed space in there.

p.c: Lina: There's a crystal ball next to your bed
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0070.png[/img]

What crystal ball?
[img]./assets/img/story/0071.gif[/img]

p.c: O_O
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0072.gif[/img]

*Internal screaming*
[img]./assets/img/story/0073.gif[/img]
[img]./assets/img/story/0074.gif[/img]

p.c: That's going into the vault
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0075.gif[/img]

Huh? Unless your mom kept one under the floorboards, you've never seen a safe or similar contraption around the house. What are you supposed to put in the vault?

p.c: Lina: Put the skull in the vault
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0076.gif[/img]

Skull? What skull? You would remember if you find or trip over another skull in the hallway, and you're pretty sure you haven't found any today. Hopefully it'll remain that way for the rest of the week.

First the pigeons, now a skull in a vault? What is up with you today?

[img]./assets/img/story/0077.gif[/img]

Oh! Looks like SS is back!

p.c: Lina: Answer chum
p.b:
[img]./assets/img/story/0078.gif[/img]

[color=#ff9966]SS: But I can always add more to the experience :P[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Gaah nooo[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I've seen enough skulls to last me a lifetime![/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: But what about... spines... with ribs still attached?[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Ok, now I'm pulling your leg[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: That last idea is ridiculous[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: ...[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I've actually had a full skeleton fall on me when I open my wardrobe before...[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Ok, I didn't realize it was that bad[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: I thought that it was just a few skulls here an there[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I wish[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Then again, thats quite a serious... skeleton in the closet[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I really hope it's fake...[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: But something is telling me it's...you know[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Oh wow[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: What kind of stuff was your mum involved with for that to be...[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Actually there?[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I...don't know[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Well, thats a problem if ever there was one[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: She really was a pretty normal person, as much as I can remember of her[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Ahh, but what, in this world, could be considered normal?[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: True...[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: But now we're getting into the realm of the downright arguable[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Shall we step back from this precipice?[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Yes please[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Let's step like a MILE away from there[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Sounds like a plan[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Back to the more solid ground of non-dead things[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: How's Sareck?[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Haven't seen the guy since last holidays, actually[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Another reason that I'm looking forward to the boarders weekend coming up[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Oh right, you couldn't bring him with you...[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I'm sure he'll be extremely happy when you finally go home c:[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Nup, they have a no-pets policy[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Same here, he's such a good dingo[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Does he bark a lot?[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Or bite?[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Dingoes don't really bark, actually[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: They howl more[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Like wolves? Cool![/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: As for the biting, he USED to, but the training Hunter and I put him through got that out of him[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Well, Dingoes are a subspecies of grey wolf, I found out recently in a compulsory bio course[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Oh! That's interesting![/color]
[color=#663399]RB: They're less dangerous though, right?[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: To humans, yes, I figure so[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: They're smaller than American wolves[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I'd like to meet him :D[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Who knows, you might[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Maybe maybe![/color]
[color=#663399]RB: We're meeting up with everyone in the game soon so we'll see how it goes[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I was trying to get hints of how the game works after entry from VZ[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: But she's hellbent on keeping her lips shut[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Wait, how does she know so much about it?[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I don't know[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Its just a thing she does, eh?[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: But she and her brother has been working on some...well, she called it counter-apocalype stuff[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: It has something to do with her weird grudge against Google[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Counter... apocalypse?[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Yeah I know right?[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: And Google...[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I have no clue what she's talking about[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Neither do I[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: She's keeping mum but I will figure it out one way or another[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: VZ could be babbling nonsense with how far fetched her theories of Google world domination are[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: I mean, I hate to sound the Doubting Thomas, but recently I've started to take what Zoey's said with a liberal pinch of salt[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Well, I think we all told her how weird her ideas were[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: I'm sure we have, at one point or another[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: I definitely have[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Perhaps that's why I haven't heard much from her[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: I suppose I should apologize, if we're all going to play this game together[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Ahh, how did you tell her?[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Maybe you should...?[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I don't know[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: She seems a little preoccupied these days[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Busy preparing for game entry I think[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Well, I sent some, uh, rather scathing, doubting messages on this[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Oh dear :c[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: But I don't think she's the type to hold grudges so it shouldn't be a problem[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Well, who knows, maybe her preparedness will pay off, and she'll get the last laugh[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Maybe?[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Well, youâre being quiet[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I'm falling asleep at my desk from the little sleep I've been getting haha[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: No, thats the skeleton in the closet you're worried about there :insolent:[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I don't think I want to see that skeleton again[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: It gives me a really bad feeling[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: I don't blame you[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: If a skeleton tried to jump-scare me every time I had to get new clothes, I'd be reaching for a spare pair of undies as well[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Hahaha[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Anyway, see you tomorrow![/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Will do, Lina[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Night night, don't let the skullbugs bite[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: I'll tell you how it goes in the afternoon, I suppose[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Nyep, see you then[/color]
[color=#663399]RB: Aw, I'm not going to be able to convince you to stop the skeleton jokes, am I?[/color]
[color=#ff9966]SS: Never[/color]
[color=#646464]-- secondarySeventh [color=#ff9966][SS][/color] ceased pestering radioactiveBotanist [color=#663399][RB][/color] at 00:39 --
[color=#663399]RB: :/[/color]
[color=#646464]-- radioactiveBotanist [color=#663399][RB][/color] ceased pestering secondarySeventh [color=#ff9966][SS][/color] at 00:40 --[/LEFT]
[/SPOILER]

But before we get too carried away, what is this young guy's name?
